backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: Core Team section component with team member profiles and rendering of generated team member profile images from static assets.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their purpose and functionality in the Milletmist website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining warm earth tones, light/dark mode variables, and base styling for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Milletmist website with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that renders the complete website structure with Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, and Footer sections with proper section IDs for navigation.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component describing Raavni Agrobyte as a women-led organization with company story, team image, and four value cards highlighting women empowerment, quality, social impact, and natural goodness.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section component with three contact information cards (location, email, phone) and a call-to-action message inviting visitors to join the Milletmist journey.
frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx: Core Team section component displaying four team member profiles with generated images, names, roles, descriptions, and LinkedIn links in a responsive grid layout using warm earth tone design system.
frontend/src/components/FarmerSupport.ts: Farmer support initiative section with farmer image, detailed description of ultra-poor farmer partnerships, and four impact cards showing direct partnership, sustainable income, training, and community building efforts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying the Milletmist logo, company name (Raavni Agrobyte OPC Pvt. Ltd.), copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with background image, logo, main heading, tagline, feature pills (Natural Millets, Women-Led, Farmer Support), and CTA buttons that scroll to products and about sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menu, scroll detection for styling changes, and smooth scrolling to sections (home, about, team, products, farmer-support, contact) with active section highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section displaying two millet-based products (Protein Bar and Energy Boost) with images, descriptions, benefits badges, and a list of general millet health benefits in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks to interact with the backend; currently empty with only an export statement.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-tone color palette (terracotta, sage, amber) for light/dark modes, custom gradient utilities, and font family declarations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for React Query and ICP authentication support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH color variables, Inter/Playfair Display fonts, custom animations (accordion, fade-in), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a website for Raavni Agrobyte's Milletmist brand, tracking implemented features including hero section, about us, products showcase, farmer support section, responsive navigation, and earthy organic design system with required team member portrait images.
